paragraphs.text: Islamic terror and Obama White House: Josh Earnest summons ghost of Ron Ziegler.
paragraphs.label: title

paragraphs.text: French Muslims trained by Al Qaeda and inspired by the Islamic Caliphate murder seventeen people in Paris
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: Their announced reason is revenge for the defamation of the Prophet Muhammad
paragraphs.label: testimony

paragraphs.text: Their battle cry is the Arabic declaration that 'Allah hu Akbar'(Allah is the greatest!)
paragraphs.label: testimony

paragraphs.text: In the aftermath, White House spokesman Josh Earnest briefs the media on how his boss, President Obama, sees the slaughter in Paris
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: His diagnosis: A deplorable case of "terrorism."
paragraphs.label: testimony

paragraphs.text: Reporters notice a missing adjective
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Has Earnest forgotten to mention something about the identity of the killers?
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: No, not at all, Earnest says
paragraphs.label: testimony

paragraphs.text: He is simply trying to be accurate
paragraphs.label: testimony

paragraphs.text: He explains(and I paraphrase) that the Paris assassins were just folks who happened to commit mass murder against some journalists(every spokesman's fantasy-- I speak from personal experience) and then
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: stuck for an explanation, invoked Islam
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The proof that this had nothing to do with the Religion of Peace is that it was "roundly condemned by (unnamed) Muslim spiritual leaders
paragraphs.label: testimony

paragraphs.text: Not since the hapless Ron Ziegler assured the press that his boss, Richard Nixon, was not a crook, has a White House spokesman been reduced to invoking the,"who-are-you-going- to- believe, me-or-your-lying-eyes," defense in quite such a pitiful way
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The name "Josh Earnest" may not go down in history
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: but
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: it is destined to become a "Jeopardy" answer
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: What presidential spokesman denied the existence of Islamic terrorism?
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Of course Earnest did this in a good cause-- keeping his job
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: And
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: to be charitable, his boss probably has virtuous reasons for his see-no-evil approach
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: For one thing, he doesn't want to insult American Muslims
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: who are his supporters
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: For another, he may imagine that he is protecting them from Tea Party pogroms, an abiding, if entirely imaginary, liberal concern
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: It is likely that Obama also thinks that his discreet silence about who did what to whom in Paris is a boon the American fight for hearts and minds in the Middle East
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: If
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: so
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: he is mistaken
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Muslims from Nigeria to Chechnya know perfectly well that he is dissembling
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Islam is the world's leading exporter of political and religious violence
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Some Muslims regret it
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: others see it as the fulfillment of a Koranic duty
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Either way, they don't expect the victims to pretend that the infidel bodies lying dead at their desks in Paris just happened to drop dead
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Alibiing for Islam makes Obama come off like Freddo ("Moe didn't mean nothin' by slapping me around, Mikey, he's a good guy. He's sorry, right Moe?"). Corleone
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Like Freddo, Obama can be bullied into silence and appeased by insincere apologies
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Just how insincere was evident a few days after the Paris massacre
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: when
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: the editors of Charlie Hebdo, in an act of startling courage, put another "offensive" cartoon of Mohammed on the cover of their magazine
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: Suddenly, it was back to yesterday in the House of Islam
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Churches were torched by the faithful in Mali
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: Wild anti-Western rallies took place from Chechnya to Nigeria
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The free-speech loving Imams and Ayatollahs of Josh Earnest's imagination incited worshippers with cries of blasphemy and holy war
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The New York Times, house organ of the Obama administration, responded by not publishing the caricature because "some readers" (unspecified) might be offended
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: Such weakness is entirely transparent to the Muslim world--not only to the jihadis themselves, whose ranks are swelling with every attack but to their countless millions of admirers, apologists and silent supporters
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: It is also completely clear to Israel
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: For two years, Obama and Secretary of State Kerry have relentlessly and futilely tried to convince Jerusalem to withdraw from the West Bank and agree to the creation of a Palestinian state
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The plan has been on life support for months
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: it died--at least for the duration of the Obama administration-- in the kosher supermarket where four Jews were shot dead by a gunman inspired by the (non-denominational!) Islamic Caliphate of Iraq and Syria
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The killer dedicated the job to the Palestinian people
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: The victims were buried in Jerusalem partly because their families feared their graves would be desecrated in France
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The funerals coincided with the start of the election season in Israel
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: Prime Minister Netanyahu, running for a fourth term, is implacably opposed to making concessions to the Palestinian Authority
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: one of whose components, Hamas, is a branch of the M-word Brotherhood
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Obama has made it clear that he would like Netanyahu to lose
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: This is a good thing for the Prime Minister
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Even the left understands that there can be no deal backed by an American Godfather who is who is scared of Moe Greene
paragraphs.label: assumption
